refsect2.title: get-attr [OPTIONAL_OPTIONS] -p [PROPERTIES...] -a [ATTRIBUTES...] FILES
refsect2.para: Gets one, more, or all attributes of properties.

listitem.para: Property is the name of an XML tag. More properties can be separated by a comma or instead of that, just add more -p options.
It's possible to use sub properties. For example: "-p property1/property2/property3"
Attributes of an XML tag. Like: <dm:property attribute1="myvalue" attribute2="test"/>
Multiple attributes are possible. Examples: -a attr1,attr2 or -a attr1 -a attr2
Notice: Don't set the -a option if you want to see everything.
In case of errors in the XML files, this option exits the script without writing any changes. If not specified, files causing errors will be reported and otherwise be ignored.
